channel.title: Help please bank booths problem
channel.description:
i have made some bank booths and i am annoyed that they only face south how do i get them to face north any1 have an idea? the code i have is
makeGlobalObject(2740, 3572, 2213, -1, 10); // bankbooth makeGlobalObject(2741, 3572, 2213, -1, 10); // bankbooth
Please could anyone help Also could any1 tell me how to make safe zones im not very good at coding but i like to try :) if any1 would like to come on the server to see my problem for themselfs the ip is
project-2k9.no-ip.biz 86.170.38.177 i-like-pk-sex.no-ip.biz
or add me on msn
Tom_killer@hotmail.co.uk
Thankyou and peace

item.title: Help please bank booths problem
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

public boolean nonWild for safe zones.

If you don’t know how that boolean works, read the tutorial in the Tutorial Section.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please bank booths problem
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

makeGlobalObject(2740, 3572, 2213, -1, 10); // bankbooth

Learn the Syntax:

2740 3572 is the Coords— X,Y
2213 is the Object ID (Bank Booth)
-1 is the Object Facing. Change it to 0,1,2
10 – Dont Change

I think Change to 2 for South

Read full topic

item.title: Help please bank booths problem
item.dc:creator: @vinku12 vinku12
item.description:
@vinku12 wrote:

makeGlobalObject(2740, 3572, 2213, -1, 10); // bankbooth
makeGlobalObject(2741, 3572, 2213, -1, 10); // bankbooth
here
ur problem is at -1 you can change it to 0,-1,-2,and -3 so u can change the to south…

Read full topic
